data.price: Rẹ apá rẹ nílẹ̀ dáadáa (bọ̀wọ̀) fún àwọn méjèèjì nípa ṣíṣe àánú wọn. Kí o sì sọ pé: “Olúwa Ẹlẹ́dàá mi, kẹ́ àwọn méjèèjì nítorí pé, àwọn méjèèjì náà tọ́ mi ní kékeré.”
data.arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ ٱلذُّلِّ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَةِ وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱرۡحَمۡهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرٗا

dua.name: Dua for Parental Blessing
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine mercy and compassion for parents, emphasizing respect, love, and spiritual support for one's elders.
